statements: SELECT * FROM traffic_lights;
SELECT location, color FROM traffic_lights WHERE color = 'red';
SELECT schedule_start_time, schedule_end_time FROM traffic_lights WHERE location = 'Main Street';
SELECT * FROM traffic_lights ORDER BY location ASC, color DESC;
SELECT color FROM traffic_lights WHERE schedule_start_time < '08:00:00';
SELECT * FROM traffic_lights WHERE location = 'Main Street';
SELECT light_id, color FROM traffic_lights WHERE color = 'Red' ORDER BY light_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_lights WHERE schedule_start_time < '08:00:00';
SELECT location, schedule_start_time FROM traffic_lights WHERE color IN ('Red', 'Green') ORDER BY schedule_start_time ASC;
SELECT light_id, location, schedule_end_time FROM traffic_lights WHERE schedule_start_time < '12:00:00' AND color = 'Yellow';
SELECT * FROM Traffic_Light_Configurations ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT color, duration FROM Traffic_Light_Configurations WHERE duration > 30;
SELECT id, color FROM Traffic_Light_Configurations WHERE color = 'Red';
SELECT * FROM Traffic_Light_Schedules WHERE start_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT id, day_of_week FROM Traffic_Light_Schedules ORDER BY day_of_week ASC;
SELECT * FROM Traffic_Light_Configurations WHERE duration > 30 ORDER BY color DESC;
SELECT color, duration FROM Traffic_Light_Configurations WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY duration ASC;
SELECT id, color, duration FROM Traffic_Light_Configurations WHERE color='Red' OR color='Green' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Traffic_Light_Schedules WHERE day_of_week='Monday' ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT end_time, start_time FROM Traffic_Light_Schedules WHERE day_of_week='Friday' ORDER BY end_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM Traffic_Lights_Configurations;
SELECT location, color FROM Traffic_Lights_Configurations WHERE color='Red';
SELECT schedule_id, day_of_week, start_time, end_time FROM Traffic_Lights_Schedules ORDER BY day_of_week;
SELECT street_name, vehicle_count FROM Traffic_Flow WHERE direction='North' ORDER BY vehicle_count DESC;
SELECT light_id, location, color, duration FROM Traffic_Lights_Configurations WHERE duration > 30;
SELECT * FROM Traffic_Lights_Configurations ORDER BY light_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, color, duration FROM Traffic_Lights_Configurations WHERE color = 'Red';
SELECT street_name, direction, vehicle_count FROM Traffic_Flow WHERE vehicle_count > 1000 ORDER BY vehicle_count DESC;
SELECT light_id, location, color, duration FROM Traffic_Lights_Configurations WHERE duration > 30;
SELECT schedule_id, light_id, day_of_week, start_time, end_time FROM Traffic_Lights_Schedules WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday' ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_lights WHERE light_color = 'red'
SELECT light_id, light_color FROM traffic_lights WHERE intersection_id = 1
SELECT intersection_id, COUNT(light_id) AS total_lights FROM traffic_lights GROUP BY intersection_id
SELECT * FROM intersections WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY street_name DESC
SELECT schedules.schedule_name, configurations.configuration_data FROM schedules JOIN configurations ON schedules.schedule_id = configurations.config_id
SELECT street_name, city, state FROM intersections WHERE city='New York' ORDER BY street_name DESC
SELECT schedule_name, start_time, end_time FROM schedules WHERE end_time>'12:00:00'
SELECT light_color, intersection_id FROM traffic_lights WHERE intersection_id=3
SELECT config_id, configuration_data FROM configurations WHERE light_id=1
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE schedule_name LIKE '%evening%'
SELECT * FROM TrafficLightConfigurations;
SELECT schedule_name, start_time, end_time FROM TrafficLightSchedules WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location, road_name FROM Intersection WHERE road_name = 'Main Street';
SELECT vehicle_id, detection_time FROM VehicleDetection ORDER BY detection_time DESC;
SELECT flow_direction, flow_rate FROM TrafficFlow WHERE flow_rate > 100;
SELECT * FROM VehicleDetection WHERE intersection_id = 1;
SELECT schedule_name, start_time, end_time FROM TrafficLightSchedules WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location, road_name FROM Intersection WHERE id = 2 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT flow_direction, flow_rate FROM TrafficFlow WHERE flow_rate > 100 ORDER BY flow_rate DESC;
SELECT id, light_color, duration_seconds FROM TrafficLightConfigurations WHERE duration_seconds < 60;
